allSaves.value: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

details.flavorText: Alchemy intrigues many duergars, and their cruel traditions often motivate them to experiment on slaves. Eager to inflict pain and justify the abuse as a method of expanding knowledge, duergar bombardiers often accompany slaver bands so they can have the first chance to select their next test subjects from captured victims. To duergar bombardiers, the lob of each bomb represents a new opportunity to observe how their targets react and record the results to enhance future modifications to their alchemical concoctions.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy} 1. Its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

Heightened The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Heightened Choose either the 2nd-level or 4th-level version of this spell and apply its effects to 10 willing creatures.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
A duergar bombardier's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until the next time they make their daily preparations.

When first exposed to bright light, the monster is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} until the end of its next turn. After this exposure, light doesn't blind the monster again until after it spends 1 hour in darkness. However, as long as the monster is in an area of bright light, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled}.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Lesser)]{Acid Flask }, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)]{Alchemist's Fire }, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)]{Tanglefoot Bag }
The duergar bombardier has a range increment of 30 feet with their bombs instead of 20 feet.

The duergar bombardier creates a single alchemical item from their formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the start of the duergar bombardier's next turn.
The duergar can use Interact to draw a bomb, then Strike with it.
